solution_line_template: She needs twice as many lilies as the {snapdragons_per_arrangement} snapdragons in the arrangement so she needs {lilies_multiplier}*{snapdragons_per_arrangement} = <<{lilies_multiplier}*{snapdragons_per_arrangement}={lilies_per_arrangement}>>{lilies_per_arrangement} lilies

She needs {roses_per_arrangement} roses, {daisies_per_arrangement} daisies, {snapdragons_per_arrangement} snapdragons and {lilies_per_arrangement} lilies for a total of {roses_per_arrangement}+{daisies_per_arrangement}+{snapdragons_per_arrangement}+{lilies_per_arrangement} = <<{roses_per_arrangement}+{daisies_per_arrangement}+{snapdragons_per_arrangement}+{lilies_per_arrangement}={flowers_per_arrangement}>>{flowers_per_arrangement} flowers per arrangement

She needs {flowers_per_arrangement} flowers per each of the {tables} tables for a total of {flowers_per_arrangement}*{tables} = <<{flowers_per_arrangement}*{tables}={total_flowers}>>{total_flowers} flowers
